projects.title: Submeet
projects.description: As a member of the web service team, developed and operated the 'Music NFT Sales' service. Developed an admin panel used for service operation. Integrate and debug blockchain code for NFT creation, sales, and management.

projects.title: DICS Students
projects.description: A site that manages disciplinary points for DICS school students. Building a disciplinary points check site for students and an admin site. Building a suggestion box system where students can suggest what they want. The site has been operational since its launch and has undergone maintenance.
